description:
Hiro`s wife and Kazuya`s sister-in-law, Sumire is a violet-haired beauty with a happy personality.
Sumire is blissfully unaware that Kazuya is in love with her, which makes her attempts to mother him all the more horrifying for the poor guy. She often embraces Kazuya, which either causes him to have a nosebleed or renders him catatonic.
Sumire and Hiro met each other in college, where he was her sempai. (Hiro was in third year when she entered college). Sumire was Kazuya`s English tutor during his third year of middle school (At the time she was in her fourth year in college, majoring in English culture).
Her tutoring helped Kazuya pass the Ryokuto entrance examination. Sumire played the Queen in the "Here is Devilwood" movie.
name: Hasukawa Sumire
